body_html:
I'm sorry for the wrong tf.while_loop syntax, it's just an illustration.

My target is to run the optimizer in a tf.while_loop inside the computational graph.
The eager execution would not stop me from using Python evaluations; instead it enforces the usage of Python loops.

I'm not sure, if we are talking about the same problem...

body:
I'm sorry for the wrong tf.while_loop syntax, it's just an illustration.

My target is to run the optimizer in a `tf.while_loop` inside the computational graph. 
The eager execution would not stop me from using Python evaluations; instead it enforces the usage of Python loops.

I'm not sure, if we are talking about the same problem...
